page.title: 19The School Day (Cont)
page.content: After we have finished the work we mark them all together and then we get on with our work which usually involves some work to do with our theme for the term, over the past year we have been working on themes to do with colour which included a visit to Chester Zoo,a history project on castles with a visit to The Tower of London and we have been studying a local area of woodland 'Grinsill' some os us have been on a weekend visit to the City of York which we have enjoyed very much and have made books of our own about the visit.As well as this work some of us work in our maths groups or science which we enjoy after break we usually change over with the afternoons being art work, music or drama or even games and P.E., if we have a games period.
